fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player on your list to Mimic. Until the start of the next night, you will appear as that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a list of all evil roles in game that have attack capability.
- You show up as your Mimicked role if you die during night or day.
- If the player you're Mimicking is hanged or dies, you permanently gain their attributes and abilities, including factional related abilities. You lose the ability to Mimic.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the town lose, dead or alive.
